textboxes.description: As you're reviewing quarterly reports in your office, your phone rings with an unfamiliar number. You pick it up, and a smooth voice says, 'Good afternoon, Ms. Em. This is Petro Magia. We have a business proposition that could be very profitable for someone in your... unique position.'

The voice continues, 'We need someone with financial clout to help us acquire a rare magical resource, a fuel that enhances spells exponentially. We're talking about an exclusive supply deal — you’ll have access to our reserves for a price. Are you interested?'

choices.text: Ask for more details about the investment

textboxes.description: 'We’re asking for an investment of 500,000,' the voice says. 'Your contribution will secure you a portion of the profits and a priority share in any magical resources we obtain. It’s a rare opportunity — and one not everyone can afford.'

Your confidence impresses the representative. 'We can expedite the deal for a partner as seasoned as you. A one-time investment of 500,000 will give you access to our entire Petro Magia supply chain, plus a preferred partnership.'
'A face-to-face meeting? Bold request,' says the voice. After a pause, they agree to arrange it in a high-security location. 'But remember, in-person deals are non-negotiable.'

You transfer the funds and receive a confirmation. 'Welcome to Petro Magia, Ms. Em. This partnership will open doors you didn’t even know existed.' You feel a surge of power — and the weight of a substantial investment.
You push back on the amount, presenting an alternative offer. After a tense pause, the voice replies, 'Very well. 300,000. But the terms will be less favorable. Are you in?'
You arrive at a high-security, glass-walled office. A figure in a tailored suit greets you, offering a hand. 'Let’s make history together,' they say with a grin.

choices.text: Seal the deal with a handshake

textboxes.description: With Petro Magia’s partnership secured, you feel a mix of excitement and caution. Only time will tell if this investment brings prosperity... or peril.
